title:
A simple
Modern OS.
custom_init_system_desc: ArcirisOS uses its own init sequence built with noa-bootstrap, enabling minimal overhead and precise control over system startup and service management.
async_pkg_verfication_desc: The iris package manager performs non-blocking package integrity checks during startup, ensuring system reliability without slowing down boot time.
secure_by_desgin_desc: ArcirisOS tracks installed files per-package and can detect corruption or tampering in real time. All changes are verifiable, auditable, and reversible.
download_page_desc:
